title: Quarterly Sales Report Q1
content: In Q1 we saw a 15% increase in revenue driven by our new product line and expanded markets.

title: Quarterly Sales Report Q2
content: The Q2 numbers show steady growth with an 8% uptick in subscriptions and a successful marketing campaign.

title: Employee Handbook
content: This handbook outlines company policies, benefits, and procedures for all new employees.

title: Product Spec: Model X
content: Model X features include a 7-inch display, 12-hour battery life, and IP68 water resistance.

title: Marketing Plan 2025
content: Our marketing strategy for 2025 focuses on digital channels, influencer partnerships, and targeted ads.

title: Customer Feedback Summary Q1
content: Summary of customer feedback highlights product strengths, areas for improvement, and feature requests.

title: Internal Memo: Office Relocation
content: We will be relocating our HQ to the downtown campus starting June 1. Details on parking and access follow.

title: Annual Financial Summary 2024
content: The fiscal year 2024 ended with a net profit of $2.3M and a gross margin of 45%.

title: Training Guide: Onboarding
content: This guide helps new hires get up to speed on tools, processes, and team structures.

title: Press Release: New Partnership
content: We are excited to announce a strategic partnership with Acme Corp to co-develop new AI features.
